jd:
Hi,
Hope you are doing well.

Please find the Job description below and let me know your interest.

Position : Lead Business Analyst- Workday
Location : Remote (but must live on the east coast or in EST time zone)
Duration : 15+ months
Mode of interview : Video

Job description :
REQUIRED SKILLS
• BSA Workday HCM Suite - Candidates have worked on/ideally led 1-2 full lifecycle Workday implementation experience, preferably on the client side (don’t need to be technical within Workday)
- Someone who understands how to lead business process design with stakeholders and facilitate requirements (not just “gather” requirements) so a Lead who is business process oriented
- Worked for an enterprise with a global presence, and manufacturing industry experience
  o All must have global and manufacturing experience is important here
  o Workday Implementation experience
• At least worked on 2 full lifecycle implementations
• Has done integrations
• Be a self-starter with solid interpersonal skills - projecting a very positive customer-service-oriented attitude.
• Great communication and collaboration skills
• Proficient in Excel
• Ability to multi-task and manage concurrent tasks
• Experience with data governance, master data management

NOTE: If I miss answering over the phone
The BEST way to communicate is through an EMAIL or LinkedIn.
